price: How many generations We have destroyed before them! Do you sense a single one of them or even hear from them a whisper?
arabic: وَكَمۡ أَهۡلَكۡنَا قَبۡلَهُم مِّن قَرۡنٍ هَلۡ تُحِسُّ مِنۡهُم مِّنۡ أَحَدٍ أَوۡ تَسۡمَعُ لَهُمۡ رِكۡزَۢا

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
